name: Oni (itch) (OfflinePlayer)
description:
In Oni you play as a demon appointed as a leader by a town's desperate citizens. To stay powerful, the demon demands food and occasionally human sacrifices from the villagers. The demon is inconvenienced by other demons that want to take over the village as well as assassins hired by the unsatisfied townsfolk.

The mission in the game is to find the balance between keeping the villagers seemingly satisfied and obtaining power to vanquish evermore powerful enemies, and follow the story as it progresses. There are many ways to die and start the game over.
